DEMO_515_MSG_010:
̂Prior to your departure, I have one more thing that
I need to share with you...
ā
DEMO_515_MSG_020:
̂Master ȁ... this is not the first record I
have of your training sessions here in the Colosseum.
DEMO_515_MSG_030:
̂I have documented here that you've previously achieved an A-Rank License, right before you went off to fight Mother...
ā
DEMO_515_MSG_040:
̂However, she defeated you, took all of your memories, and then imprisoned you in what you know now as the "Paradise".
ā
DEMO_515_MSG_050: ̂It would appear that your allies found you... they rescued you, and ultimately guided you back here to learn once more.
DEMO_515_MSG_060:
̂Hmm... it would appear the time has finally arrived to
reveal to you many truths of your past.
ā
DEMO_515_MSG_070:
̂I'm sure you've been noticing that many call you Anses.
This is the name you originally had at birth...
ā
DEMO_515_MSG_080: ̂I can say no more, however. If you head to the Resistance's secret base, all of these truths will be revealed.
